item.title: Design Tips For Developers
item.description: This little post is based around the talk I gave at Bathcamp. Rich Quick came up with the great idea that, whilst Bathcamp attendees are mostly developers, a talk on design for developers was probably appropriate. And you might have seen on my post from last week, I was looking for a case study to use in my talk. As happens with everything, I just didnâ€™t have time to include the case study in the talk, so I thought I would blog it here as a follow-up from Bathcamp.
